title: The Miracle of Marcelino (Drama, 1955) Rafael Rivelles, Antonio Vico, Juan Calvo | Full Movie

sources.title: The Miracle of Marcelino (Drama, 1955) Rafael Rivelles, Antonio Vico, Juan Calvo | Full Movie
sources.description:
Left on the doorstep of a monastery as an infant, Marcelino was raised by the monks. He was well-cared for but lonely and missed having a mother. Marcelino encounters Jesus on a crucifix, who miraculously appears, grants him a wish to see his mother and the Virgin Mary.

Original title: Marcelino pan y vino (1955)
This film is available with English & Spanish audio, and has many subtitle language options.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/hd9CZSXQL00


Director: Ladislao Vajda
Writers: José María Sánchez SilvaLadislao Vajda
Stars: Rafael Rivelles, Antonio Vico, Juan Calvo
Genres: Comedy, Drama
